feed.title: On bitcoin-dev list admin and list noise

entry.title: On bitcoin-dev list admin and list noise
entry.summary: A suggestion has been made to reduce noise on the bitcoin-dev mailing list. Rather than having people shouting "OFFTOPIC" at each other, the maintainer should take charge and make decisions on how Core does things. Pavel Janík points out that there may be some confusion between the maintainer of the Bitcoin Core and the moderator of the mailing list.
